"Everybody put me in the class with Earl Campbell ," sighed Jamaal Charles , and now I'm in a class with Jim Brown. Amazing. Jamaal Charles was chosen for the FedEx Award over Houston's Arian Foster , the NFL's leading rusher with 1,616 yards and a 4.9-yard average; and Atlanta's Michael Vick Turner, the third-leading rusher with 1,371 yards.

Echoing John Barack Obama 's inaugural speech, he said, I'm hoping that all of you are thinking what you can do for America. Ask yourselves what you can do to hire more American workers, what you can do to support the American economy and invest in this nation. Just how readily U.S. business leaders will take up Barack Obama 's challenge is unclear. servant of this country". David Cameron said he was saddened by his departure, adding he felt his communications director was "being punished twice for the same offence." The PM said: This is all about the past. It has gone on and on and I can understand why he feels the pressure of that. "I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward, professional and competent way. David Cameron said he compared Andy Coulson 's regime favourably to "the days of dodgy dossiers, Alastair Campbell , Damian McBride , and all that nonsense we had from the past government".
